title: Application Performance Monitoring
description:
Implement Application Performance Monitoring (APM) System

Set up comprehensive application performance monitoring to track database queries, API response times, and identify system bottlenecks in real-time.

Requirements:
- Integrate an APM solution (e.g., New Relic, DataDog, Elastic APM, or custom instrumentation)
- Implement database query monitoring with the following metrics:
  * Query execution time
  * Query frequency and patterns
  * Slow query identification (queries exceeding defined threshold)
  * Connection pool utilization
  * Query-level error rates
- Track API endpoint performance including:
  * Response time for each endpoint (p50, p95, p99 percentiles)
  * Request throughput and rate
  * Error rates and types per endpoint
  * Payload size monitoring
- Create automated bottleneck detection:
  * Identify endpoints consistently exceeding response time thresholds
  * Flag resource-intensive database queries
  * Monitor memory and CPU usage patterns
  * Track third-party service dependencies and latency
- Set up alerting for performance degradation:
  * Define thresholds for critical metrics
  * Configure notifications for anomalies
- Build dashboards for visualization:
  * Real-time performance overview
  * Historical trend analysis
  * Query performance breakdown
  * API endpoint comparison
- Document baseline performance metrics before implementation
- Ensure minimal overhead from monitoring instrumentation (< 5% performance impact)
